title: Pixel 5 SMS issue (MMS working)
content:
I got my pixel 5 in January and all has been well. However, as of Monday suddenly my contacts are not receiving my sms messages. It says sent on my side but they aren't received They can receive my mms messages and from what I can tell I can receive their sms messages. Google and AT&T have both been unable to determine issue after hours and hours on the phone and both have blamed each other. Any ideas? 

I've done a massive amount of troubleshooting (factory reset, reset wifi, clear messages cache, switch off connected/advanced messages, etc.)
